Title: Relates to the calculation of rates for certain treatment pursuant to the medical assistance program
Summary: Requires the office of addiction services and supports and the office of mental health to publish information for calculation of rates paid for certain treatment pursuant to the medical assistance program in a form an manner prescribed by the commissioner of the office of addiction services and supports or the commissioner of mental health, as applicable.
LawCode: Amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L; amd §7, Chap of 2025 (as proposed in S.6897-A & A.7038-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to the calculation of rates for certain treatment pursuant to the medical assistance program; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2025 amending the insurance law relating to requiring rates paid for rehabilitation and opioid treatment be pursuant to certain fee schedules published by the office of addiction services and supports, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 6897-A and A. 7038-A, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
